backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing news items with publish, remove-by-title, and fetch-all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the frontend and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, copyright text, and external attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.tsx: Reusable auto-playing carousel component with hover pause and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook managing creation and lifecycle of backend actors tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider offering login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useNews.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, publish, and delete news through an actor API, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including layout and background utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with an image slider, team overview, goals, vision, values, and member descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays the team's history with milestone timeline and an image slider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring hero section, team description, navigation buttons, and core values list.
frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx: Shows innovation projects with an image slider and detailed cards for each project.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: React page handling news display plus PIN-gated add/remove workflows, including dialogs, form validation, and integration with publish/remove hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning or retrieving stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented features, pending requests, and the overall news-page improvement objectives.
